meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes for the February 11, 2025 meeting.

agenda_items.title: Discretionary Annual Bonus
agenda_items.description: Deliberation on a discretionary annual bonus for the General Manager for calendar year 2024.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Oak & Ellum
agenda_items.description: Consideration of a resolution for a multifamily residential development.

agenda_items.title: Resolution for Mountain Creek at Clark Road
agenda_items.description: Consideration of a resolution for a single family development.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of 2025 Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s 2025 Budget.

agenda_items.title: Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Treasurer’s report for January 2025.

agenda_items.title: Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report as of March 11, 2025.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.

financial_items.description: Proposed loan to partially finance the construction and development of single family homes.
